this_title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters Season 2
trans_title: 百慕大三角洲：被诅咒的水域 第二季
introduction: The Bermuda Triangle is the most famous piece of ocean in history, inspiring both dread and curiosity. These seas, which are bounded by Florida, Bermuda, and Puerto Rico, have swallowed innumerable ships and planes, as well as their personnel, without leaving behind any evidence. The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters Season 2 will be broadcast on The History Channel on Tuesday, November 14, 2023, in the United States.The same dive team that made international headlines last year when they discovered a segment of 1986 Space Shuttle Challenger returns to the waters off the coast of Florida to make more mind-blowing underwater discoveries across 12 new episodes.
chinese_title: 百慕大三角洲：被诅咒的水域 第二季
foreign_title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters Season 2
